summary: Pariah is a master destruction mage with very powerful unique spells.
descriptionHtml:
[center][line]
[COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]My Other Mods[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[line]
The Place Beyond The Pines
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52628/?]Nexus Download Link[/url]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/52628-3-1396643081.jpg[/img]
Unique Follower - Natalie
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52835/?]Nexus Download Link[/url]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/thumbnails/52835-1-1397064504.jpg[/img]
[line]
[SIZE=7][FONT=Impact][COLOR=#ffffff]Introduction[/COLOR][/FONT][/SIZE]
[line]
Pariah is a master destruction mage with very powerful unique spells. She is leveled with the player and can be found roaming the entrance to the Winterhold College.
[line]
[COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]Installation[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[line]
Use NMM to install or if your doing it manually then just copy the files downloaded here and place them in your skyrim data folder and say "yes" if asked to merge anything.
[line]
[COLOR=#ffffff][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]Uninstallation[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[line]
Just deactivate in NMM or delete the "Pariah.esp" and the meshes and textures you can go find them to remove otherwise no harm done if they are just left there.
[line][/center]
author: HarrisModifications
